entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
